subject: Re: [junit] using newInstance for TestCase
msgSnippet: The constructor takes the name of the test case to run.  The class itself is just a fixture. You can invoke the constructor via reflection passing in the name
messageBody:
The constructor takes the name of the test case to run. The class
itself is just a fixture.

You can invoke the constructor via reflection passing in the name of
the test case (method) as the Object[].

see:
Class.getConstructors()
Class.getConstructor(Class[])
Constructor.newInstance(Object[]).

=jason
